title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 98-5.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 98-5.2 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Subpart shall apply to all MCOs offering coverage that are subject to the mental health and substance use disorder requirements under Insurance Law § 4303 and Public Health Law § 4406. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
98-5.2

Adopted

New

York State Register February 26, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 08, eff. 7/1/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
